identify areas of improvement Attend six sigma, lean manufacturing and process control equipment conferences to stay abreast of process control techniques/advancements/ in the broader steel manufacturing industry     Job Requirements   Degree in Metallurgical Engineering or Materials Science Engineering 5 years’ experience working in a Quality Assurance or Engineering team Familiar with
